= link:opencv.html[OpenCV] / Java Development =
:title: 用 Java 開發 OpenCV 的應用

== 延伸閱讀 ==

 * link:../javacv/javacv.html[JavaCV]
 * http://ubaa.net/shared/processing/opencv/[Processing and Java Library] (ubaa.net)
 * Official Desktop Port?

== 參考資料 ==

 * http://answers.opencv.org/question/2137/wrapping-opencv-with-desktop-java-building-for-64/[Wrapping OpenCV with desktop Java: Building for 64-bit x86 - OpenCV Q&A Forum] (2012-09-07) - automatically generated Java/JNI wrappers for Android，所以能用在 desktop Java。
 * http://kuanming-style.blogspot.tw/2012/04/processing-opencv-blob-detection.html[影。像。生。活: Processing + OpenCV 的特徵提取（blob detection）試驗] (2012-04-30)
 * http://codeanticode.wordpress.com/2011/11/21/opencv-2-in-processing/[OpenCV 2 in Processing « codeanticode] ^http://diigo.com/0w6sj[閱讀]^ (2011-11-21) - ubaa.net 提供的 Processing library 沒有進一步支援到 OpenCV 2，因此有人拿 JavaCV 另外包裝出 JavacvPro，看起來 JavaCV 還是居於領導也位？
 * http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2037579/java-opencv-bindings[Java OpenCV Bindings - Stack Overflow] ^http://diigo.com/0w6rc[閱讀]^ (2010-01-10) - official desktop Java port, much friendly than Java.
 * http://nuigroup.com/forums/viewthread/3531/[Java and OpenCv - NUI Group Community Forums] ^http://diigo.com/0w6rj[閱讀]^ (2008-11-13) - 看來 Java 整合 Processing 的 library 是可行的。
